subject: Implement Secrets Versioning System
description:
Create versioned secrets with safe rotation:
1. Create /home/ken/control-plane-api/src/app/api/secrets/route.ts
2. Add secrets table: project_id, name, value_encrypted, version, active, rotated_from, rotation_reason, created_by
3. Add secret_consumers table tracking who uses each secret
4. Implement rotation flow: create v2 → mark v1 inactive → notify consumers → 24h grace → delete v1
5. Create UI showing secret history and rotation status
6. Add PGP encryption for values
7. Audit all secret access and rotations

Secrets are living things, not static values.
